thread.section_title: Ink Station Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ink Station | inkstation.com.au | 4 of 1286
thread.title: murray gordon
thread.title_full: Ink Station reviewed by murray gordon

author: murray gordon
title: murray gordon
text:
Went into the post office to collect the inks that I had ordered, only to find that they had not arrived, my order was placed on 16/02/17 and was told it would be there in 3 days maximum.I phoned Ink Station when I got home only to find after 15 minutes, on two separate occasions the line was busy.
the following morning I tried again and after 10 minutes I got through and was told my order was there but that someone had forgot to move it over to the dispatch area. I was lucky that I did have just enough to see me through .I will give them another chance in the hopes of a good outcome
